alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 1:15AM MST until November 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Melville Foothills, Northern Carbon, Northern Stillwater, Northern Sweet Grass, and Southeastern Carbon. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on icy and snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact Thanksgiving day travel including over portions of I-90, US-212, and US-191. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow accumulations are expected to be west of US-191, as well as along and south of I-90.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southeastern Carbon
